mapper.select: SELECT * FROM excel_order_seq ORDER BY eos_seq ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE excel_order_seq SET eos_seq = #{eosSeq}, eos_location = #{eosLocation}, eos_excel_total_qty_flag = #{eosExcelTotalQtyFlag} WHERE eos_pk = #{eosPk}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO excel_order_seq( eos_seq eos_location eos_combine_flag, eos_begit_flag ) VALUES( #{eosSeq}, #{eosLocation}, 0, 0 )
